title: Morgan Stanley’s Profit Falls 11% as Deals Slow
sub_head: Fees from mergers and fundraisings drove decline as corporate CEOs hung back
body:
Morgan Stanley ’s profit fell 11% from a year ago, reflecting a decline in corporate deal making and a treacherous stretch for markets.
The bank posted a profit of $3.7 billion, or $2.04 a share. Analysts polled by FactSet expected $1.71 a share. Revenue fell 6% to $14.8 billion in the quarter, surpassing expectations of $14.25 billion.
